attributes.action: Make sure that half terms are consistent throughout England and Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Being a student myself, it angers me when I want to visit my friend in Wales that his half-term is either a week after or a week before mine. Why is it this way? There is no obvious reason why and it is a pain in the neck when I was to visit him.
It's not country variation either, schools within the same country, and in fact county have differing half term dates. Please sort this out, for families and friends.
